08:42 · 8 October 2015

Having tests is way more important than when you write them. I don’t think the “always do TDD” motto is valid… “always do X” rarely is.

08:09 · 7 October 2015

I always get this sense of dread that anything could explode at any time when I have no regression testing backing me.

08:06 · 7 October 2015

I’m not even talking about TDD, just generally speaking when working on an important feature that must not break.

08:06 · 7 October 2015

How do you even code without tests? How can you prove that your code works? How do you prevent regressions?

Spoiler: you can’t.
